Body:
Description: Hi Team,

We are facing an issue regarding to configure the Entra Id groups for Monitor& alerts in StealthBits, Kindly assist us how to configure Entra ID groups in StealthBits.
Invitation updated. Attendees: Ian Ranstrom, Arunachalam K
Invitation updated. Attendees: No attendees listed

What We've Learned Updated: The customer would like a job setup that monitors 6 specific groups and alerts on changes.

Configure monitoring & alerting in StealthBits for Entra ID groups:
AzRBAC Contributor-NPD
AzRBAC Contributor-PRD
AzRBAC Owner-Root
AzRBAC Contributor-Root
AzRBAC MSP-IaaS-Admin-NPD
AzRBAC MSP-PaaS-Admin-NPD
Next Steps Updated: Review requirements and engage appropriate teams if needed.

Description Updated: Request to setup job to monitor the groups and alert on change:
AzRBAC Contributor-NPD
AzRBAC Contributor-PRD
AzRBAC Owner-Root
AzRBAC Contributor-Root
AzRBAC MSP-IaaS-Admin-NPD
AzRBAC MSP-PaaS-Admin-NPD
Steps to Reproduce Updated: N/A Job creation request
